Live music, wine tastings, events, private parties & catering. Tasting deVine Tasting deVine
Cheers to 25 Years! Tasting deVine
Cheers to 25 Years! Tasting deVine
Cheers to 25 Years! Tasting deVine
Cheers to 25 Years! Enjoy Local Wine & Beer at a Wine Tasting Room in the Heart of Downtown Wheaton About Us Where it all began... Where it all began... Where it all began... Tasting deVine in Wheaton was opened as Lynfred Winery's first tasting room location outside of the winery in 1999; serving wines from Lynfred along with beer from local breweries, in a comfortable atmosphere. Wine & Beer Where it all began... Where it all began... Enjoy a wine tasting, wine by the glass or cold beer inside our tasting room or outside at our sidewalk seating, April through October. Join the Wine Club Where it all began... Join the Wine Club Membership has its benefits! 10% off all bottle purchases 20% off all case purchases Exclusive Sales & Special Member Events! September Tasting Tastings & Flights Change Monthly Tasting of 6 Wines Sauvignon Blanc 2024 Vinde City White Symphony 2024 Pinot Noir 2023 Teroldego 2022 Syrah 2019 Premium Wines Viognier 2019 Reserve & Merlot 2016 Reserve Enjoy by the glass or a 2 oz. taste Sweet Tasting Oktoberfest Mango Cherry Blueberry Sangria Blanc Sangria Rouge Local Craft Beers Enjoy a cold beer in a frosted glass or take it to-go Crystal Lake Brewing Co. Hoptopus - Imperial Hazy IPA Oktoberfest - German Style Lager Penrose Goofy Boots - Juicy Hazy IPA Lemon Seltz-Up Pink Lemonade Seltz-Up Summer Crush - Hazy IPA with Orange Zest Oktofest - Marzen Pollyanna Brewing Co. Lite Thinking - American Lager Summerly - Raspberry Wheat Ale Blind Corner Brewing Booter -  Hazy IPA XPA - Extra Pale Ale Go Brewing - NA New School Berry Sour Sunshine State Tropical IPA Specials Wine by the Glass & Tasting Specials Member Mondays Stock your wine rack! Wine Club Member's save 20% on bottles to-go each Monday! Wine Down Wednesday Enjoy $6 glasses of the Vinde City White, Vinde City Red, Rosé, Oktoberfest, Sangria Blanc & Sangria Rouge All Day! Thirsty Thursday ﻿ Join us on Thursdays for a Staff Pick of the Week! Each week one of our staff members will choose their favorite wine for our glass special! Follow our Instagram and/or Facebook to find out what we are pouring each week! September Glass & Flight Specials Spiced Apple Mule Pair the crisp Fall weather with a Spiced Apple Mule! Spiced Apple Wine, Apple Cider & Ginger beer, by the Glass for $14 ($12 members) (Available soon!) Teroldego Vertical Flight Taste 3 - 3oz pours of the Teroldego 2020, 2021 & 2022 side by side! Sample each vintage to discover your favorite! Flight of 3 for $14 ($10 members) Monthly Red Glass Special Each month we will choose a special wine to be featured all month at a discounted glass price! Enjoy the Merlot 2019 all month! (End of batch, get it before it's gone!) By the Glass for $10 ($8 members) Cheese Plates Compliment your wine or beer with a cheese plate Small Cheese Plate Three cheeses, grapes & crackers, sausage may be added Perfect for 1-2 Large Snack Plate Three cheeses, sausage, grapes, mixed nuts, crackers & pretzels Serves 2 - 4 Artisan Cheese Plate Three premium, aged cheeses, marinated olives & crackers Events 9/6 Live Music Event Details 9/6 Live Music Enjoy live music by Robbie Grabowski from 6-8pm while sipping on a glass of wine! Reserve a table by calling 630-752-9463. 9/10 Sip & Stitch Event Details 9/10 Sip & Stitch Wednesday, September 10th, 6-8pm Grab your yarn and thread and join us for a relaxing evening of crafting and sipping on wine! Call to reserv... Event Details 9/16 Perfume Blending Class Event Details 9/16 Perfume Blending Class Tuesday, September 16th, 6 pm A hands-on sensory journey, blending your own custom perfume in a beautiful roller ball bottle! $30 pp - RSVP R... Event Details 9/23 Bingo Game Night Event Details 9/23 Bingo Game Night Tuesday, September 23rd, 6:00pm Enjoy a fun night of playing bingo and sipping on wine! $20 pp includes 2 glasses of wine and a bingo card! Ear... Event Details 9/24 Wine of the Month Varietal Class Event Details 9/24 Wine of the Month Varietal Class Wednesday, September 24th, 6:00pm Sip and learn about the wines of the month! Our very own Dick Westall will guide your taste buds through d... Event Details More Events Join the Wine Club at Tasting deVine New Release Wine Club Members receive one bottle of the newly released wine, which alternates between red and white every month     $21.50 / month Red Wine of the Month Members receive the new red wine that is released every month $21.50 / month White Wine of the Month Members receive the new white wine that is released every month $21.50 / month Fruit Wine Club Members choose their 'club' wine from any of our 18 delicious fruit wines with a charge of $14 / month Sparkling Wine Club Members choose their 'club' wine from any of our Sparkling wines with a charge of $21.50 / month Premium Wine Club Members choose their 'club' wine from any of our Reserve or Port wines with a charge of $31.50 / month Member Benefits Include: 10% off bottle purchases 20% off case purchases (12 + bottles) Exclusive member events and SALES! Join 2 Clubs and receive a '2 glasses of wine for a penny' monthly coupon (Limit 1 per visit, Fruit Club excluded) Join today to enjoy the September Wines of the Month! The New Release and White Wine of the Month is the Symphony 2024. This vintage is 100% Symphony with grapes from Lodi, California. The Symphony has aromas of gardenia, tropical fruits, pineapple & passion fruit with a fruity & floral palate of lychee, grapefruit, mango, peach & guava juice. Enjoy with fish, spicy chicken or Asian cuisine. The Red Wine of the Month is the Teroldego 2022. This vintage of Teroldego is 92% Teroldego and 8% Petite Sirah grapes from Clarksburg, California. This full bodied wine has aromas of raspberry, cedar, cloves & earthy notes with a palate of blackberry, tart plum, vanilla, spices, dark chocolate & toasted oak. Pair this wine with lasagna, roast beef or aged cheeses. Photo Gallery Subscribe Sign up to hear from us about specials, sales, and events. Email Sign up Social Featured on WGN Celebrating our 25th Anniversary June 2024! Contact Us Contact Us Enjoy a glass! Don't just read about us, come on in and try our monthly wine tasting, local craft beers, special flights or enjoy a glass! Tasting deVine 127 West Front Street, Wheaton, IL 60187 630.752.9463 tastingdevine@gmail.com Hours Monday - Thursday: 11am - 8pm Friday - Saturday: 11am - 9pm Sunday: 12 - 8pm Send a Message Send a Message Name Email* This site is protected by reCAPTCHA and the Google Privacy Policy and Terms of Service apply. Customer Care For questions about orders, reservations, or general inquiries, email us at [email protected] and we’ll respond asap. For questions about wine clubs and shipping, get in touch with [email protected] or [email protected] . Trade & Media Looking for technical sheets and approved assets? You’ll find everything you need in our Brooks Tech Sheet folder . Partnerships Brands, influencers, and ambassadors wanting more information on partnering with Brooks, please reach out directly at [email protected] .
